snippet.title: I, the Inquisitor - Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Based on the book series "I, the Inquisitor" written by Jacek Piekara.

Imagine that Jesus Christ didn’t die for our sins. Imagine he descended from the cross and, filled with hate, punished his executioners.
Imagine Europe at the end of the middle ages. Filthy, stinking, and savage.
That is the world where our game takes place.
Explore Koenigstein and become embroiled in a conflict that is yet to emerge.
You are Mordimer Madderdin, Inquisitor of the Holy Office, and this is your story.

Created by The Dust - https://thedust.pl/

All Rights Reserved.

Join our:
https://www.facebook.com/ItheInquisitor/
https://twitter.com/itheinquisitor
